original: KOCKEN, Charles Gunnar Thorvald, Kapten, Direktör, Stockholm, f Västantorp, öbr l, 17/4 87, gm Gundel Hammarstrand. Hal, ingex Tekn Elem.sk i Norrkp 08. Prakt å arkit.kont 08—10, bitr ing o arb.led v Kreuger 6 Tolls kraftstnsbyggn 10—12, ing v Nord Jvgsbyggn AB 12—13, arb.led v Kreuger & Tolls fabr.byggn i Hallsta, Hagfors o Varberg samt v brobyggn.arb 13—18, dir.ass i AB Byggn.varor Sthlm 18—22, vkst dir o styr.led där 22—38, vkst dir f Ag.fma Gunnar Th Kocken sed. 39 samt medarb i Allm Hdls AB. Styr.led i Nelsons Stenind AB i Linkp. Av Sthlms hdlskamm utsedd besiktn.man. Kapt 1.4 :s reserv. Borgare i Sthlm o medl av Sthlms Borgargille.
translated: KOCKEN, Charles Gunnar Thorvald, Captain, Director, Stockholm, born in Västantorp, outside Linköping, on April 17th, 1887, married Gundel Hammarstrand. Has no technical elementary education in Norrköping since 1908. Practical work at architectural offices from 1908 to 1910, assistant engineer and work leader at Kreuger & Toll's power station construction from 1910 to 1912, engineer at Nordiska Järnvägsbyggnads Aktiebolag from 1912 to 1913, work leader at Kreuger & Toll's factory construction in Hallsta, Hagfors and Varberg, as well as bridge construction work from 1913 to 1918. Assistant director at AB Byggnadsvaror in Stockholm from 1918 to 1922, deputy director and board member there from 1922 to 1938, deputy director of Ag.fma Gunnar Th Kocken since 1939, as well as employee at Allmänna Handels AB. Appointed as inspector by the Stockholm Chamber of Commerce. Captain in the reserves from April 1st. Citizen of Stockholm and member of Stockholm's Citizen Guild.
